# AppleIMA4

**Enumeration Case**

The Apple implementation of IMA 4:1 Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.

## Declaration

```swift
AppleIMA4
```

## Discussion

This format uses no flags.

## Pulse Code Modulation Formats

- **LinearPCM**: The linear Pulse-Code Modulation (PCM) format.
- **DVIIntelIMA**: The DVI/Intel IMA Adaptive Differential Pulse-Code Modulation (ADPCM) format.
